sentences.sContent: her heroic efforts to save her family
sentences.sCn: 她拯救家人的英勇行为

sentences.sContent: Lawrence’s heroic struggle against his destiny
sentences.sCn: 劳伦斯与命运的勇敢抗争

sentences.sContent: She portrayed him as a heroic figure .
sentences.sCn: 她把他描述为英雄人物。

synos.tran: 英雄的；英勇的；记叙英雄及其事迹的；夸张的

words.tran: 英勇，英雄气概；英雄行为；勇敢的事迹

trans.tranOther: extremely brave or determined, and admired by many people
